short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Duplicate Custom Labels and Create

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for salesforce custom labels in salesforce org, find duplicates and create new custom labels seeing any possible duplicates in value
How to use?
1. Click on  Add To Chrome button
2. Once installation is completed, Login to SFDC
3. From Setup, Quick find, type Custom Label and click Custom Label
5. Click on Label icon on right top to open extension workspace!!!
